content: what is app_unexpander? There is also delab attribute. what is the difference?

My guess: app_unexpander is for delab for function application.

delab is a general delab

Delaborators and unexpanders also operate on different data types: delaborators work on converting expressions into syntax, while unexpanders transform syntax into different syntax for pretty-printing (and app_unexpanders work specifically on function applications, as you mentioned)

There's more on this at https://leanprover-community.github.io/lean4-metaprogramming-book/extra/03_pretty-printing.html.
@Anand Rao Tadipatri Thank you!
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
